SEARCH
Package com.isblocks.pkcs11

Class Cryptoki

java.lang.Object
com.isblocks.pkcs11.Cryptoki
public class Cryptoki extends Object
Low-level non-static java interface that maps to NativeProvider cryptoki calls.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cryptoki()
    Default constructor uses JNA NativeProvider.

    Signs (encrypts with private key) data in a single part, where the signature is (will be) an appendix to the data, and plaintext canot be recovered from the signature.

      slot - location that receives the slot ID
      reserved - reserved. Should be null

    • InitToken

      public long InitToken(long slotID, byte[] pin, byte[] label)
      Initialises a token. Pad or truncate label if required.
      Parameters:
      slotID - ID of the token's slot
      pin - the SO's initial PIN
      label - 32-byte token label (space padded). If not 32 bytes, then it will be padded or truncated as required
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_InitToken(long, byte[], long, byte[])

      Parameters:

      flags - from CK_SESSION_INFO
      application - passed to callback (ok to leave it null)

      CKR return code

      public long DigestKey(long session, long key)

      key - secret key to digest
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:

    • DigestFinal

      public long DigestFinal(long session, byte[] digest, LongRef digestLen)
      Finishes a multiple-part message-digesting operation.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      digest - gets the message digest
      digestLen - gets byte count of digest
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_DigestFinal(long, byte[], LongRef)

    • SignInit

      public long SignInit(long session, CKM mechanism, long key)
      Initialises a signature (private key encryption) operation, where the signature is (will be) an appendix to the data, and plaintext cannot be recovered from the signature.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - the signature mechanism
      key - handle of signature key
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_SignInit(long, CKM, long)

    • Sign

      public long Sign(long session, byte[] data, byte[] signature, LongRef signatureLen)
      Signs (encrypts with private key) data in a single part, where the signature is (will be) an appendix to the data, and plaintext canot be recovered from the signature.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      data - the data to sign
      signature - gets the signature
      signatureLen - gets signature length
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_Sign(long, byte[], long, byte[], LongRef)

    • SignUpdate

      public long SignUpdate(long session, byte[] part)
      Continues a multiple-part signature operation where the signature is (will be) an appendix to the data, and plaintext cannot be recovered from the signature.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      part - data to sign
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_SignUpdate(long, byte[], long)

    • SignFinal

      public long SignFinal(long session, byte[] signature, LongRef signatureLen)

      session - the session's handle
      signature - gets the signature
      signatureLen - gets signature length
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_SignFinal(long, byte[], LongRef)

    • VerifyInit

      public long VerifyInit(long session, CKM mechanism, long key)
      Initialises a verification operation, where the signature is an appendix to the data, and plaintet cannot be recovered from the signature (e.g. DSA).
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - the verification mechanism
      key - verification key
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_VerifyInit(long, CKM, long)

      CKR return code

    • GenerateKey

      public long GenerateKey(long session, CKM mechanism, CKA[] templ, LongRef key)
      Generates a secret key, creating a new key.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - key generation mechanism
      templ - template for the new key
      key - gets handle of new key
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_GenerateKey(long, CKM, CKA[], long, LongRef)

    • GenerateKeyPair

      public long GenerateKeyPair(long session, CKM mechanism, CKA[] publicKeyTemplate, CKA[] privateKeyTemplate, LongRef publicKey, LongRef privateKey)
      Generates a public-key / private-key pair, create new key objects.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - key generation mechansim
      publicKeyTemplate - template for the new public key
      privateKeyTemplate - template for the new private key
      publicKey - gets handle of new public key
      privateKey - gets handle of new private key
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_GenerateKeyPair(long, CKM, CKA[], long, CKA[], long, LongRef, LongRef)

    • WrapKey

      public long WrapKey(long session, CKM mechanism, long wrappingKey, long key, byte[] wrappedKey, LongRef wrappedKeyLen)
      Wraps (encrypts) a key.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - the wrapping mechanism
      wrappingKey - wrapping key
      key - key to be wrapped
      wrappedKey - gets wrapped key
      wrappedKeyLen - gets wrapped key length
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_WrapKey(long, CKM, long, long, byte[], LongRef)

    • UnwrapKey

      public long UnwrapKey(long session, CKM mechanism, long unwrappingKey, byte[] wrappedKey, CKA[] templ, LongRef key)
      Unwraps (decrypts) a wrapped key, creating a new key object.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      mechanism - unwrapping mechanism
      unwrappingKey - unwrapping key
      wrappedKey - the wrapped key
      templ - new key template
      key - gets new handle
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_UnwrapKey(long, CKM, long, byte[], long, CKA[], long, LongRef)

      templ - new key template
      key - ges new handle
      Returns:
      CKR return code

    • GetFunctionStatus

      public long GetFunctionStatus(long session)
      In previous versions of Cryptoki, C_GetFunctionStatus obtained the status of a function running in parallel with an application. Now, however, C_GetFunctionStatus is a legacy function which should simply return the value CKR_FUNCTION_NOT_PARALLEL.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_GetFunctionStatus(long)

    • CancelFunction

      public long CancelFunction(long session)
      In previous versions of Cryptoki, C_CancelFunction cancelled a function running in parallel with an application. Now, however, C_CancelFunction is a legacy function which should simply return the value CKR_FUNCTION_NOT_PARALLEL.
      Parameters:
      session - the session's handle
      Returns:
      CKR return code
      See Also:
      • NativeProvider.C_CancelFunction(long)
